description: This file defines a React functional component named 'GlassHeader' which renders a top header bar with branding, template selection dropdown, template management actions, and a confirmation dialog for deletion. It includes various props for handling template operations and state management for dialog visibility.

methods.name: GlassHeader({ templates = [], selectedTemplate, onTemplateChange, onSaveDraft, onOpenTemplateManager,  onDeleteTemplate })
